Text: Brazil's largest fixed-line carrier expects to raise more than R$10 billion (Us$2.4 billion) by selling its mobile operations, according to two of the sources, who spoke on condition of anonymity .
Cause: selling its mobile operations, according to two of the sources, who spoke on condition of anonymity .
Effect: Brazil's largest fixed-line carrier expects to raise more than R$10 billion (Us$2.4 billion)
Sentence: <e2>Brazil's largest fixed-line carrier expects to raise more than R$10 billion (Us$2.4 billion)</e2> by <e1>selling its mobile operations, according to two of the sources, who spoke on condition of anonymity .</e1>
